articles.title: Elche 1-1 Real Madrid: Champions lose ground on leaders Atletico Madrid - Goal India
articles.description: Chelsea have posted a profit of £32.5 million ($44.4m) in in their latest set of financial results - but the club still saw a year-on-year fall in overall turnover part in thanks to the Covid-19 pandemic.
